Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment1.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object

    Book class

    COMP249
    Assignment 1
    Due date: Thursday, January 31st, 2018

      Constructs a new Book object, whose title, author, isbn and price are specified by the arguments of the same name parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book()
        Constructs a new Book object with the default values. By default, the title of the book is set to "The Alchemist", the author is set to "Paulo Coelho", the ISBN is set to 061122416 and the price is set to $11.99.

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String title,
    java.lang.String author,
    long isbn,
    double price)
        Constructs a new Book object, whose title, author, isbn and price are specified by the arguments of the same name parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - title of the book
        author - author of the book
        isbn - ISBN of the book
        price - price of the book

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Gets the current value of the Title attribute

        The title is a String value that is usually written on the cover of the book.

        Returns:
        String - title of the Book

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the value of the Title

        The title is a String value that is usually written on the cover of the book.

        Parameters:
        title - title of the book

      • getAuthor

        public java.lang.String getAuthor()
        Gets the current value of the Author attribute

        The author is the name of the person that wrote the Book.

        Returns:
        String - author of the Book

      • setAuthor

        public void setAuthor(java.lang.String author)
        Sets the value of the Author attribute.

        The author is the name of the person that wrote the Book.

        Parameters:
        author - author of the book

      • getIsbn

        public long getIsbn()
        Gets the current value of the ISBN attribute

        The ISBN is a 10 or 13 digit number sequence that is unique to the Book.

        Returns:
        long - ISBN of the Book

      • setIsbn

        public void setIsbn(long isbn)
        Sets the value of the ISBN attribute.

        The ISBN is a 10 or 13 digit number sequence that is unique to the Book.

        Parameters:
        isbn - ISBN of the Book

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Gets the current value of the price attribute

        The price is the currency (in CAN$) that is needed to buy the book.

        Returns:
        double - price of the Book

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice(double price)
        Sets the value of the price attribute.

        The price is the currency (in CAN$) that is needed to buy the book.

        Parameters:
        price - price of the book

      • getNumberOfCreatedBooks

        public static int getNumberOfCreatedBooks()
        Gets the current value of static variable counterBook

        The variable counterBook is incremented every time a Book is created. It is used to know how many Books have been created at any point in time.

        Returns:
        int - total number of created Books

      • equals

        public java.lang.Boolean equals(Book other)
        Checks whether two Books are equal
        Parameters:
        other - the Book to compare with this Book
        Returns:
        Boolean - true if both Books have the same ISBN and the same price; false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representing this Book and its values.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String - returns all the value of all the attributes of a Book to make it recognizable.
